name: Assteroids (Pie Baron)
description:
You are a test chamber buttman, one of the scientists who created you on Phallion orbital research array has become infected with some of the same foreign matter used to create you, extracted from the mysterious organic cosmic body classified as Flatusphere_0.

You have been reduced in size and injected at point of infection, how long can you delay the infection from spreading, or was this course of action a mistake?

- controller support (tested xbx360)
